name: Cryptica
storyline: Play as Ari Harper, as he desperately attempts to find his missing sister, who has disappeared with her film crew while making a documentary in Antarctica. Uncover unfathomable horrors, discover ancestral secrets, and find your sister at all costs. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas, all while the world ends and the apocalypse begins.
summary: Cryptica is a narrative-based psychological horror game where the apocalypse is just the beginning. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas while the world ends.
